alert.note: Alert for Hale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:52PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hale County through 115 PM CDT... At 1251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greensboro. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Sawyerville, Greensboro Municipal Airport, Wateroak and Harper Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
